name: Ever Since You
description: When someone you love dies, and you're not expecting it, you don't lose him/her all at once; you lose him/her in pieces over a long time—the way the mail stops coming, and his/her scent fades from the pillows and even from the clothes in her closet and drawers. Gradually, you accumulate the parts of him/her that are gone. Just when the day comes—when there's a particular missing part that overwhelms you with the feeling that he/she's gone, forever—there comes another day, and another specifically missing part.
